Class ClothingItem

java.lang.Object
ClothingItem
public class ClothingItem extends Object
Description of your ClothingItem class.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ClothingItem (int itemId, String itemType, double price, int stock, String size, String brand)
    The constructor creates an instance of the class ClothingItem by calling the constructor of the superclass (Item) and initializing the additional fields (size and brand).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method and Description
    String getSize()
    Returns the size of the clothing item.
    String getBrand()
    Returns the brand of the clothing item.
    void reduceStock()
    Reduces the stock of the clothing item by one if the current stock is greater than zero.
    String toString()
    Overrides the toString method to provide a formatted string representation of the clothing item.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClothingItem

      public ClothingItem (int itemId, String itemType, double price, int stock, String size, String brand)
      The constructor creates an instance of the class ClothingItem by calling the constructor of the superclass (Item) and initializing the additional fields (size and brand).
      Parameters:
      itemId - : The unique identifier for the clothing item.
      itemType - : The type of the clothing item.
      price - : The price of the clothing item.
      stock - : The initial stock quantity of the clothing item.
      size - : The size of the clothing item.
      brand - : The brand of the clothing item.

  • Methods Details

    • size

      Represents the size of the clothing item.
      Type:
      String

    • brand

      Represents the brand of the clothing item.
      Type:
      String

    • ClothingItem

      public  ClothingItem (int itemId, String itemType, double price, int stock, String size, String brand)
      Initializes the ClothingItem object with the provided values and calls the constructor of the superclass (Item) using super.
      Parameters:
      itemId - : The unique identifier for the clothing item.
      itemType - : The type of the clothing item.
      price - : The price of the clothing item.
      stock - : The initial stock quantity of the clothing item.
      size - : The size of the clothing item.
      brand - : The brand of the clothing item.

    • getSize

      public  String  getSize ()
      Returns the size of the clothing item.
      Returns:
      The size of the clothing item.

    • getBrand

      public  String  getBrand ()
      Returns the brand of the clothing item.
      Returns:
      The brand of the clothing item.

    • reduceStock

      public  void  reduceStock ()
      Reduces the stock of the clothing item by one, but only if the current stock is greater than 0.

    • toString

      @Override public  String  toString ()
      Overrides the toString method from the superclass (Item) to provide a custom string representation of the ClothingItem object. The representation includes the item ID, type, price, stock, size, and brand.
